page.title: 09FOOT PATHS
page.content: In the old days there were no roads, there were only foot paths.If a farmer wanted to go to another farmer he had to use the{foot paths}.Little land was cultiveted,forests and swamps held wild beasts including wild wolves and wild boar.There were{bridle paths}as well so that those fortunate enough to own a horse could ride on them.Cart tracks in those days would have seemed like our{motorways.} Our Domesday block is blesed with a very large number of foot paths and bridle paths which are used purely for recreational purposes,walking and riding.
